long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browser extension for www.urligram.com. Save and share sites from any page, with one click. 
With this extension you can save a link on www.urligram.com without leaving the current site, adding tags to it as well as setting this link as private, so only you will see it.
